reg=/(\/category\/detail\?[^"]+).+?>[\u4e00-\u9fa5]+/gi;
tmp=""; result="";
x=["","all?style=2&page=searchPage&chanId=","mm/all?style=2&page=searchPage&chanId="];
function f(a,b){
tmp+=String(a.match(reg)).replace(/,?(\/category[^"]+).+?>([\u4e00-\u9fa5]+)/g,"$2 / "+b+"::$1&&").replace(/::\D+(\d+)\D+(\d+)\D+(female|male)&&/g,"::/$3$1&subCateId=$2&&").replace(/female/g,x[2]).replace(/male/g,x[1]);return tmp;};
result+=f(fa,"ç”·é¢‘");
result+=f(fb,"å¥³é¢‘");
result="ä¸‰æ±Ÿ::/book/sanjiang&&å¼ºæ¨::/book/strongrec&&ç­¾çº¦ä½œå“::/all?style=2&page=searchPage&sign=1&&å…è´¹å°è¯´::/all?style=2&page=searchPage&vip=0&&æ€»æ”¶è—æ¦œ::/all?style=2&page=searchPage&orderId=11&&æ€»å­—æ•°æ¦œ::/all?style=2&page=searchPage&orderId=3&&å‘¨æ¨èæ¦œ::/all?style=2&page=searchPage&orderId=9&&æœˆæ¨èæ¦œ::/all?style=2&page=searchPage&orderId=10&&æ€»æ¨èæ¦œ::/all?style=2&page=searchPage&orderId=2&&"+result;
</js>

/**
è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ•°ç»„ n ä¸­çš„æ•°å­—ï¼ŒåŠ è½½1ä»½æˆ–å¤šä»½ä¹¦å•ã€‚
1åˆ°5ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«å¯¹åº”5å¤§ç±»ä¹¦å•ï¼›ä»6å¼€å§‹ï¼Œåˆ™ç²¾é€‰äº†å‡ ä½ä¹¦å•å¤§ä½¬çš„ä¹¦å•ï¼Œå³ï¼š
1ã€"æ‰€æœ‰"ï¼›
2ã€"æœ€æ–°"ï¼›
3ã€"ç²¾å“"ï¼›
4ã€"ç”·é¢‘"ï¼›

n=[3,8];
m=["all","newest","essence","man","women",788682,756653,333316,888741,402302,698727,27857,560124];
u1="::/api/booklist/";
u2="?page=searchPage&&";

result="";

n<6?www=w1+m[n-1]:www=w2+m[n-1]+w3;

for (i in n){result+=wy(n[i])}
